meanings.definition: The ability to exert great physical force or power.
meanings.sent1: His superstrengths helped him lift the heavy box effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's superstrengths allowed him to defeat the villain with ease.
meanings.sent3: The robot's superstrengths made it the strongest competitor in the weightlifting contest.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she had superstrengths after drinking the energy drink.
meanings.sent5: The mountain climber's superstrengths were put to the test when scaling the steep cliff.

meanings.definition: Exceptional or extraordinary strengths or abilities.
meanings.sent1: Her superstrengths performance in the competition impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The team's superstrengths strategy led them to victory.
meanings.sent3: The cat's superstrengths agility amazed the audience as it leaped from one platform to another.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like a shield of superstrengths against any obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The artist's superstrengths creativity shone through in every masterpiece.
